column5: Latest;Sihanoukville:------ On the evening of May 17
column7: a team of doctors working in Preah Sihanouk  Referral Hospital said that five people had been sent to a hospital for emergency treatment. One later died.------The patients were living in the special economic zone of Preah Sihanouk province
column8: and apparently had been exposed to a toxic fungus. According to relatives
column9: the patients had eaten fungus dishes.------A hospital spokesman confirmed “The 5 people who have been affected by  have been severely ill
column12: one of the five patients died
